attributes.action: Government must act: over 1million are going without the care they urgently need
attributes.additional_details:
Pledges to fix the care system have been repeatedly pushed aside by governments for the last 20 years, whilst people go on struggling to find care for their loved ones. Our care system is dangerously inadequate and needs to be reformed.

Government recognises the need for a long term plan. Now it must act and publish proposals for a sustainable solution so we can all receive quality care both today and in the future.

www.careandsupportalliance.com/CareCampaign
attributes.background: A chronic lack of funding means older & disabled people are going without the care they need, including help to get out of bed, wash and eat - without this basic help they cannot live a decent life. The Government must keep their promise to bring forward their proposals on social care by early 2018.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

We understand that you're concerned about the care system, but we're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to see. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
